#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
        long long int last,i,j,k,m,n,t,sum,diff;
        scanf("%lld",&t);
        for(i=0;i<t;i++)
        {
                scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
                if(n-k==0)
                        printf("%lld\n",k);
                else
                {
                        diff=(n-k)/2;
                        last=k+diff*2;
                        sum=(diff+1)*(k+last)/2;
                        printf("%lld\n",sum);
                }
        }
}
